pageDescription: Explore immigration opportunities through Canadian Provincial Nominee Programs (PNPs)
pageIntro: Provincial Nominee Programs allow Canadian provinces and territories to nominate individuals who wish to immigrate to Canada and who are interested in settling in a particular province or territory.

provinceSelector.title: Select a Province or Territory
provinceSelector.description: Each Canadian province and territory (except Qu√©bec and Nunavut) has its own Provincial Nominee Program. Select a province to explore its immigration programs.
provinceSelector.mapInstructions: Click on a province or territory to view its immigration programs
provinceSelector.clickForDetails: Click 'View Programs' to see immigration options for this province

programFinder.title: {{province}} Immigration Programs
programFinder.description: Explore immigration pathways available through the {{province}} Provincial Nominee Program.
programFinder.noPrograms: No programs found for {{province}}. Please try another province.
